short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HN comments are distracting. Hide them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Comments on Hacker News can be pretty distracting, and sometimes just plain vitriolic. This is a Chrome extension to hide everything that has to do with comments on the site. Hopefully it will help you focus on content and not get wrapped up in Internet debates.
